name: Magnamon
description: Magnamon is a Warrior Digimon. It armor digivolved through the power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles . It possesses tremendous defensive ability, its offensive power is equivalent to that of a Mega Digimon, or even greater, and it is one of the " Royal Knights ".  No matter what kind of predicament those who acquire the power of the Digi-Egg of Miracles fall into, they're able to overcome it through that miraculous power, and as such, it's definitely appropriate to call it a Miracle Item.
